title: Tankard
marks:
Mark

On the handle are engraved the initials [A
text: The English form of this tankard is overlayed with Dutch and Northern European inspired decoration, namely the stamped foliate banding and the applied mask with pendant fruit and flowers on the handle.
description: tankard; flat engraved top serrated in front; corkscrew thumb piece; body decorated near base with foliate border; handle decorated with cherub motif; embossed handle tip
creditline: Gift of James F. and Louise H. Bell
